text: It was a handbreadth thick,7:26 A handbreadth is approximately 2.9 inches or 7.4 centimeters. and its rim was fashioned like the brim of a cup, like a lily blossom. It could hold two thousand baths.7:26 2,000 baths is approximately 11,600 gallons or 44,000 liters; LXX does not include this sentence.
